com.example.sickar.main.helpers

Class BarcodeProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.sickar.main.helpers.BarcodeProcessor

  • public class BarcodeProcessor
extends Object
    Runs the background barcode process. This is a singleton class so all barcode processing threads are spawned from the same thread pool. Access the instance of this class using BarcodeProcessor.getInstance() Call start() and stop() to start and stop this BarcodeProcessor. New frames are added via pushFrame(Image frame) and the background threads will continuously pop off new frames or wait until new ones are available. The frame buffer works as a stack where newest frames are added to the top and popped off the top.

      Runnable for processing the contents of a frame.
